title: Interrogation.Dream3.Start
body:
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot1>>
Manager: We know how this is going to go
Manager: You're smarter than the others you know
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot2>>
Manager: I don't think you belong here 
Manager: not like the others
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot4>>
Manager: So lets work together
Manager: you help us out, and we'll help you out
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot1>>
Manager: I think I can arrange a work transfer
Manager: You know you won't survive much longer in those caves
Manager: Don't be a dummy now
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot3>>
Emma: ....
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot4>>
Manager: Not going to talk huh?
Manager: Going to be a brave one too?
Manager: I thought you were smart
<<returnToCampScene SceneShotController>>
